Tensor Translator¶

The tensor translator module was created with the idea of simplify the transition from some formats (specially normalized) to the tensor format.

Translation¶

defined_translation(func, dims, coords, ...)

Translate any kind of format that allow slice or indexing (ideal for normalized formats like the one used by relational databases) to Xarray.

tensordb.storages.ZarrStorage.exist
